articles.title: Europe's freedom faces greatest 'threat' since WW2, says Macron - BBC
articles.description: The French president has called for his country's defence spending to rise by €3.5bn (£3bn) in 2026.
articles.content:
French President Emmanuel Macron has outlined plans for a big increase in defence spending, warning Europe's liberty is facing a "greater threat" than at any time since the end of World War Two.
